data.text: “Adamadina dunuɲa yi gidin xɔdɔxɔ
alo konyina,
Na kiini, n kɛɛn bata findi fuun na
N na n sa, n yi a fala, n naxa,
Kunle nun bɛndɛna n fatin ma
N ma siimayaan mafura danguɛ
“Ala, a xa rabira i ma,
Yɛɛn naxan n matoma,
Kundaan naxan danguma,
A mi fa xɛtɛma a banxini sɔnɔn,
“Nanara, n mi fa n dunduma sɔnɔn,
Nanfera i kantan muxun dɔxi n xili ma?
N na a falama, n naxa,
Nayi, i n magaxuma xiyene yi,
A yi rafanɲɛ n ma nun, n faxa.
N ma siimayaan bata raɲaxu n ma,
“Nanse adamadiin na
han i yi lu fɛ a xɔn xɔtɔn yo xɔtɔn,
I xun xanbi soma n yi
Hali n bata yulubin liga,
Nanfera i mi n ma matandine mafeluyɛ,
